name: 2nd VPS Annual Nursing Conference
content: On behalf of the scientiﬁc Committee, it gives us great pleasure to invite you to the “2nd VPS Annual Nursing Conference” to be held on 17th April, 2020 at Rosewood Hotel in Abu Dhabi, UAE. The conference aims to discuss advances and innovations in nursing practice, as well as a breadth of other topics. Current trends with a blend of research evidence get explicitly discussed on various topics of interest for practicing nurses. The central theme would be "Nurses: Inspire, Innovate, Influence" for we believe that nursing work force is critical to health care industry. We should always keep in mind that clinical care evolves and practice can never be stagnant. It is an ideal platform to explore diverse nursing topics that will impact future practice. This is a unique opportunity to network with peers, share novel ideas on crucial issues and trends, and keep abreast of the latest updates. We look forward to your participation and hope to see you on 17th April, 2020 in our magniﬁcent city of Abu Dhabi to make the conference a success. URLs: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/587325-0?pid=4868, Brochure: https://go.evvnt.com/587325-3?pid=4868, Sponsor: https://go.evvnt.com/587325-4?pid=4868\. Prices: Early Bird Registration (1 March Only): AED 350.00, General Admission: AED 500.00\. Time: 8:00 am to 5:00 pm. Venue details: Rosewood Abu Dhabi, Al Maryah Island, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.
